com.jdroid.android.voice
Class VoiceRecognizerIntent

java.lang.Object
  com.jdroid.android.voice.VoiceRecognizerIntent

public class VoiceRecognizerIntent
extends Object

An utility class which helps ease integration with Voice Search via Intents. This is a simple way to invoke voice recognition and receive the result, without any need to integrate, modify, or learn the project's source code.

It does require that the Google Voice Search application is installed. The initiateRecord() method will prompt the user to download the application, if needed.

Author:
Maxi Rosson

parseActivityResult

public static String parseActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                         int resultCode,
                                         android.content.Intent intent)

Call this from your Activity's Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) method.

Parameters:
requestCode -
resultCode -
intent -
Returns:
null if the event handled here was not related to this class, or else a String containing the result of the voice record. If the user canceled recording, the fields will be null.
